name: vzReconnect
description:
vzReconnect

a game by vazor222

Utah Indie Game Jam 2022 page: https://itch.io/jam/utah-indie-game-jam-2022

A simple game jam game where you move the avatar by pressing the mouse button while it rotates on its own. It is super speedy and goes all over the place! Can you get it to the landing zone?

Uses the Monkey-X game engine: https://blitzresearch.itch.io/monkeyx
